programme.desc: Ireland's No. 4 ranked lightweight Peter Queally faces No. 1 ranked Patricky "Pitbull" Friere in a rematch for the vacant 155-pound title in Dublin. Plus, James Gallagher vs. Patchy Mix in a high-stakes 135-pound scrap.
